Package org.opengrok.indexer.history

Class Repository

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opengrok.indexer.history.RepositoryInfo
      • org.opengrok.indexer.history.Repository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccuRevRepository, BazaarRepository, BitKeeperRepository, ClearCaseRepository, MercurialRepository, MonotoneRepository, PerforceRepository, RazorRepository, RCSRepository, RepoRepository, RepositoryWithPerPartesHistory, SCCSRepository, SSCMRepository, SubversionRepository
    public abstract class Repository
extends RepositoryInfo
    An interface for an external repository.
    Author:
    Trond Norbye

    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • OUTPUT_DATE_FORMAT

        protected static final java.text.SimpleDateFormat OUTPUT_DATE_FORMAT
        format used for printing the date in currentVersion.

        NOTE: SimpleDateFormat is not thread-safe, lock must be held when formatting

      • RepoCommand

        protected java.lang.String RepoCommand
        The command with which to access the external repository. Can be null if the repository isn't accessed via a CLI, or if it hasn't been initialized by ensureCommand(java.lang.String, java.lang.String) yet.

      • ignoredFiles

        protected final java.util.List<java.lang.String> ignoredFiles

      • ignoredDirs

        protected final java.util.List<java.lang.String> ignoredDirs

      • tagList

        protected java.util.TreeSet<TagEntry> tagList
        List of <revision, tags> pairs for repositories which display tags only for files changed by the tagged commit.

    • Method Detail

      • getRepoCommand

        public java.lang.String getRepoCommand()
        Gets the instance's repository command, primarily for testing purposes.
        Returns:
        null if not RepositoryInfo.isWorking(), or otherwise a defined command

      • getHistoryGet

        public boolean getHistoryGet​(java.io.File target,
                             java.lang.String parent,
                             java.lang.String basename,
                             java.lang.String rev)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Gets the contents of a specific version of a named file, and copies into the specified target.
        Parameters:
        target - a required target file which will be overwritten
        parent - the name of the directory containing the file
        basename - the name of the file to get
        rev - the revision to get
        Returns:
        true if contents were found
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • getHistoryGet

        public java.io.InputStream getHistoryGet​(java.lang.String parent,
                                         java.lang.String basename,
                                         java.lang.String rev)
        Gets an InputStream of the contents of a specific version of a named file.
        Parameters:
        parent - the name of the directory containing the file
        basename - the name of the file to get
        rev - the revision to get
        Returns:
        a defined instance if contents were found; or else null

        Create internal list of all tags in this repository.
        Parameters:
        directory - directory of the repository
        cmdType - command timeout type

        Parse the given string as a date object with the repository date formats.

        Returns:
        the instance of a date
        Throws:

      • ensureCommand

        protected java.lang.String ensureCommand​(java.lang.String propertyKey,
                                         java.lang.String fallbackCommand)
        Set the name of the external client command that should be used to access the repository wrt. the given parameters. Does nothing, if this repository's RepoCommand has already been set (i.e. has a non-null value).
        Parameters:
        propertyKey - property key to lookup the corresponding system property.
        fallbackCommand - the command to use, if lookup fails.
        Returns:
        the command to use.
        See Also:
        RepoCommand

                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
